question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/arkworks/vanishing_poly.rs] [Function: from_roots()] [Field characteristic] Does the function assume a specific field characteristic (e.g., prime fields), or can it be called with binary extension fields where arithmetic behaves differently, breaking cryptographic correctness? (High)

(High)
